name: Samsara Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX-2000 series and higher or AMD RX-6000 series and higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
  • Additional Notes: GPU requirements are strict as Samsara utilises advanced Unreal Engine 5 features: Lumen Global Illumination & Reflections (Hardware & Software Ray Tracing), Nanite Virtualized Geometry & Virtual Shadow Maps, plus Temporal Super Resolution.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X or Intel Core 9700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX-4000 series and higher or AMD RX-7000 series and higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
